channel.title: Delta
channel.description: hello, this might sound stupid, but i was trying to add on delta a message that tells you when a staff member has logged in, but i couldn't do it, i also tried leeching allstar one.. but couldn't..could anybody help me?

item.title: Delta
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

thanks both of all, anyways i had already gottenit solved
btw thanks for the snippet atomic, might use for another things

Read full topic

item.title: Delta
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

I dont get it, you want to send a message to everyone, when a staff logs in?

if so, search for your server welcome message

probably welcome to ****scape

in client.java:

search: welcome to (or your welcome message)

add:

if(playerRights > 0) { yell("Staff member " + playerName + " has logged in!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Delta
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Loop through all online players and cast from Player to Client then send the message.

Example:

for (Player player : onlinePlayers) { if (player != null && rights > 0) { // send message. ((Client) player).sendMessage(String); } }

Read full topic
